name: CASEbyMediaMonksLabs
0:
”Alexa, open media monks labs CASE”
”Alexa, launch media monks labs CASE”
”Alexa, begin media monks labs CASE”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: media monks labs case
des:
For best experience, use an Amazon display-enabled device such as an Echo Show, Spot, or Fire TV and set the device language to English (United States). This skill uses Alexa Conversations, which is in Beta and only supports English (United States) at the time of publishing.

CASE (Conversational Automobile Selector Experiment), an AI-powered assistant, is a prototype created by MediaMonks Labs to explore the future of automotive sales in a hybrid physical-to-digital world. Leveraging Alexa Conversations’ NLP, Alexa’s Presentation Language, and a lengthy database of over 40 different car brands, CASE’s goal is to help users narrow down their car search based on their lifestyle in the comfort of their own homes. 

Disclaimer: This skill is for demonstrative purposes only, it is not connected to any car brand or dealership. The brands featured within this skill did not endorse nor are they affiliated with the creation of this skill. This is a prototype to demonstrate our concept and may not work perfectly. If you have any questions or feedback, reach out to labs@mediamonks.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
